text: The Minnesota Vikings are a professional American football team in Minneapolis, Minnesota. The Vikings play in the National Football Conference of the National Football League (NFL). They are in the NFC North division. The Vikings have won their division 16 times, which is the third most among teams that are playing in the NFL now. They appeared in four Super Bowls during the 1970s, and lost all four of them. Their home field is the U.S. Bank Stadium The team is called the Vikings because the state of Minnesota was settled by a great many people of Scandinavian ancestry. The historical Vikings originated in Scandinavia. == Other websites == * Minnesota Vikings Official Website * Radio Home of the Minnesota Vikings * Star Tribune Coverage of the Minnesota Vikings * Pioneer Press Coverage of the Minnesota Vikings Category:National Football League teams Category:1961 establishments in the United States Category:1960s establishments in Minnesota
title: Minnesota Vikings
